text: Glossoloma herthae is a plant species in the family Gesneriaceae. A recent review has moved it out of the genus Alloplectus.Clark (2005) It is endemic to Ecuador. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist montane forests. ==References== * (2005): A monograph of Alloplectus (Gesneriaceae). Selbyana 25(2): 182–209. title: Glossoloma herthae
